experiment.name: A whole-genome microarray study of Arabidopsis thaliana cell cultures exposed to microgravity for 5 days on board of Shenzhou 8

description.text: Arabidopsis thaliana wild type cell cultures were exposed to a 5-day space flight onboard of Shenzhou 8 to identify microgravity and space effect related gene expression.

bibliography.authors: Fengler S, Spirer I, Neef M, Ecke M, Nieselt K, Hampp R.
bibliography.title: A whole-genome microarray study of Arabidopsis thaliana semisolid callus cultures exposed to microgravity and nonmicrogravity related spaceflight conditions for 5 days on board of Shenzhou 8.

bibliography.authors: Svenja Fengler, Ina Spirer, Maren Neef, Margret Ecke, Anne Hennig, Ruediger Hampp
bibliography.title: A whole-genome microarray study of Arabidopsis thaliana cell cultures exposed to microgravity for 5 days on board of Shenzhou 8
